Àtụ:Infobox ethnonym
Asụsụ Bolgo bụ otu asụsụ Bua a na-asụ na ndịda etiti Chad, n'ime ime obodo Koya, Boli, Gagne na Bedi na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Melfi, site n'ihe dị ka mmadụ 1,800 (SIL 1993)
Ndị na-ekwu okwu mejukwara ọnụ ọgụgụ ka ukwuu nke ndị bi na mpaghara Sorki na mpaghara Ch

Dị ka de Rendinger si kwuo, o nwere olu abụọ bụ isi, Bolgo Werel gburugburu Daguela na Bolgo Mengo gburugburu Aloa-Niagara, yana otu olumba a na-akpọ Bolgo Bormo; dị ka Ethnologue si kwuo, a na-akpọ olumba ndị bụ isi ya Bolgo Dugag na Bolgo Kubar ("obere" na "nnukwu" Bolgo.) Great Bolgo na-asụ n'ebe ugwu, nke dị n'ókè Mogum na Saba; A na-asụ obere Bolgo na ndịda, n'akụkụ asụsụ Koke nwere njikọ chiri anya yana arabic chad
Òtù Bolgo na aha ndị Kastenholz depụtara (2017:4):
Usoro usoro okwu ya bụ isiokwu-ngwaa–ihe, aha–adjective, akụkụ–ngwaa, onye nwe-nwere
Enweghị ezi plural, mana -gi na-eje ozi dịka ihe nrịbama mkpokọta
A na-ewepụ ngwaa ahụ na ta, tinye ya na njedebe nke ahịrịokwu ahụ.
